issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: DeleteRole fails with "No such role" when referenced from an instance profile

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
After creating an IAM role, I was unable to delete it.

Steps to reproduce:
1. As admin user, create Identity and Access Role with any policy permissions
2. After the role is created try to delete it from the landing or detail page

Expected result: You should be able to delete the role but instead you will receive a 'No such role' error.

I have attached a screen shot of the error.

Eucaconsole logs:
{code}
2014-12-02 20:48:30 INFO ui-test-acct-00/admin@10.5.1.90 [e9QPVFEnsIRO2PSt]: Deleting role test2
2014-12-02 20:48:35 ERROR ui-test-acct-00/admin@10.5.1.90 [e9QPVFEnsIRO2PSt]: No such role
{code}
fields.summary: Receive 'No such role' error when trying to delete IAM role
